title: Is Blue Face the Best Lyricist?
itunes:title: Is Blue Face the Best Lyricist?
description:
Today on the show we had Blue Face stop by and he spoke about the drama he had with his family, and claims to be the best lyricist of his generation. The Breakfast Club was skeptical about his lyricist so they opened up the phone lines to see if listeners believed it, and lets just say the comments were not the best. Moreover, Charlamagne also gave "Donkey of the Day" to two cops for threatening AOC.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
